title: Chapter XLII - New York State Environmental Facilities Corporation
content:
Chapter XLII - New York State Environmental Facilities Corporation

State Regulations

Part 2600 - Repealed

Part 2601 - Access To Public Records (§ 2601.0 to 2601.15)

Part 2602 - State Clean Water Revolving Fund Regulations (§ 2602.1 to 2602.17)

Part 2604 - New York State Drinking Water Revolving Fund Regulations (§ 2604.1 to 2604.12)

Part 2605 - New York State Pipeline For Jobs State Revolving Fund Regulations (§ 2605.1 to 2605.12)

Part 2606 - New York State Financial Assistance To Business Program (§ 2606.1 to 2606.10)

Part 2607 - New York Beginning Farmer Loan Program Regulations (§ 2607.1 to 2607.6)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
